content: the one piece crochet hat is available as a free pattern with video tutorial through https //www katia com/blog/en/one-piece-crochet-hat-video-tutorial/ and it can be made with different color choices for the luffy look or casual look including the use of katia alabama which is one of katia s most popular yarns with a beautiful mix of cotton and high quality acrylic that gives this accessory a distinctive velvety feel **suggested materials** katia alabama - luffy look combo 2 balls of honey yellow #72 or mustard #66 and 1 ball of red #32 - casual look combo 2 balls of grey #51 and 1 ball of ochre yellow #70 - us e-4/3 5-mm crochet hook - stitch marker - scissors **skill level** intermediate this design includes a special crochet stitch basic increases easy shaping and finishing techniques **stitch guide** chain = chain st s = stitch es single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch ws = waistcoat stitch r and r s = row/round s prev = previous repeat = repeat **design attributes** worked in the round one seamless piece **pattern attributes** written instructions written pattern for techniques involved and finishing photo tutorials showing important steps of the crochet work and finishing step by step video tutorial
